title: Which of the following correctly declares an array?
What is the index number of the last element of an array with 9 elements?
What is the correct definition of an array?
answer_1: An array is a series of elements of the same type in contiguous memory locations
answer_2: An array is a series of element
answer_3: An array is a series of elements of the same type placed in non-contiguous memory locations
answer_4: An array is an element of the different type
right_answer: An array is a series of elements of the same type in contiguous memory locations

title: Which of the following gives the memory address of the first element in array?
Which of the following accesses the seventh element stored in array?
Which header file is used to manipulate the string?
How many maximum number of parameters does a string constructor can take?
Which constant member functions does not modify the string?
What is the difference between unsigned int length() and unsigned int size()?
answer_3: Returns a different value but they are same

title: Which of the following is correct about remove_extent() function?
answer_1: Removes the given dimension from an array
answer_2: Removes the first dimension from the right of the array
answer_3: Removes the first dimension from the left of the array
answer_4: Removes the last dimension from the left of the array
right_answer: Removes the first dimension from the left of the array
